Package homework1

Class account

java.lang.Object
homework1.account
Direct Known Subclasses:
message
class account extends Object
This class was created to create account objects and perform basic operations on them.
Since:
2023-03-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dogukan Tastan

  • Constructor Details

    • account

      account(int Id, String username, String birthdate, String location)
      account constructor takes 4 variables and makes the necessary assignments.
      Parameters:
      Id - contains the user Id.
      username - contains the user name.
      birthdate - contains date of birth data.
      location - contains the user's location information.
